predicate.note: Frames file for 'comply' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison.

roleset.name: cooperate

example.name: transitive
example.text: MiniScribe filed a status report detailing its efforts *trace* to comply with listing requirements...

roleset.note: Seems to occur mostly in the infinitive, so be careful of trace-chains. They can get tricky.
